Fiordland Crested Penguin, Stewart Island,December 4, 2017. Image © Francesco Veronesi by Francesco Veronesi

Be our supporter.
Every cents will help!

The Trust is looking to its supporters to make regular donations, perhaps the price of a coffee weekly or monthly.

What we do Donate now

Donate when you buy!

Enjoy your shopping and know you're supporting penguins!

Winefunder

At least $10 every 6 bottles

Stone Arrow

20% donation.
Put ‘bluepenguin’ in the discount box at the checkout!

Tumbleweed Tees

$5 from every sale of the tawaki adult t-shirts.

Find out what we have been doing, what we are planning, events you can get involved in, the latest research and more.

Early Evening West coast, June 20, 2019. Image © Clive Varley by Clive Varley

Leave
a Gift
in your Will

Thank you for considering such a valuable and valued bequest.

Learn more

Payroll Giving

If your employer offers a payroll giving scheme, this is a wonderful way to donate as you receive one third of every donation back as a tax credit.

The advice from the IRD is to give your employer:

he West Coast Penguin Trust’s name amount of the donation you want to make pay period, or periods, when you want the donation to be made the Trust’s bank account (Kiwi Saver Acc No: 38–9011–0518009–00) or postal address (231 Revell Street, Hokitika 7810)

Control, June 21, 2008, Image © Frederico Cintra by Frederico Cintra

Online Banking

'fee free' by Online Banking West Coast Penguin Trust, KiwiBank Acc No: 38–9011–0518009–00

Please include your name in the reference box and then email us.

Donate Regularly

Regular donations are the lifeblood of any charitable trust.

Partners & Sponsors

Little Penguin, Bruny Island, Tasmania, Australia,November 29, 2010. Image © JJ Harrison by JJ Harrison

Adopt
a Blue Penguin

Symbolically adopt a Blue Penguin for 12 months.

The adoption package includes:

- Annual Supporter membership
- Adoption Certificate
- Blue Penguin Fact Sheet
- Information Brochure
- “I Love Penguins” stickers
- “I Love Penguins” stickers
- Bumper sticker
- Newsletter email subscription
- Blue penguin torch keyring

If you would like to purchase this as a gift for someone else, please add their name and address in the message box or email us at info@bluepenguin.org.nz.

$120 NZD
